text: Joe Frank (August 19, 1938 – January 15, 2018) was a French-born American radio artist. He was known best for his often philosophical, humorous, surrealist, and sometimes absurd monologues and radio dramas.Peabody Awards Web site – search for Joe Frank He was born in Strasbourg, France. He worked for KPFA, WNYC, KCRW, and NPR. Frank died of kidney cancer in Santa Monica, California on January 15, 2018 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * – official site * *Joe Frank – WFMU FAQs *Joe Frank wiki Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American radio personalities Category:People from Strasbourg
title: Joe Frank
